suite.name: Base

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://localhost:3000/usuarios status=200, reason=OK headers={'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'x-dns-prefetch-control': 'off', 'x-frame-options': 'SAMEORIGIN', 'strict-transport-security': 'max-age=15552000; includeSubDomains', 'x-download-options': 'noopen', 'x-content-type-options': 'nosniff', 'x-xss-protection': '1; mode=block', 'x-moesif-transaction-id': 'fc78a9f9-1723-4791-bcfe-5da94c0647e6', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Content-Length': '4258', 'Date': 'Tue, 30 Aug 2022 14:28:22 GMT', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Keep-Alive': kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

suite.doc: Arquivo simples para requisições HTTP em APIs REST
